entries.title: Morning thoughts
entries.content: Feeling overwhelmed about choosing between two job offers. Both seem great but I'm worried about making the wrong choice.

entries.title: Reflection
entries.content: Used the app to help decide on the job. Felt less anxious seeing the categories broken down. The reversibility score was helpful.

entries.title: Weekend plans
entries.content: Trying to decide if I should go to the party or stay home. Energy levels are low today.
